desc: Looking for an experienced marketer who is familiar with the social media landscape. I run a social media growth agency specializing in Instagram growth. With 40 current clients my business brings in $20,000+ per month, however I am looking to expand. I have the resources for double or even triple the client base, but no time to handle the necessary outreach in order to find clients. This job works on an affiliate commission, wherein you will receive 15% of each sale you make. We have both business and personal clients -- the personal clients bring in an average of $300 per month, whereas the business clients range from $500-$5,000+ per month, depending on the size of their operation and their specific needs. Consequently, we focus on securing deals to help grow & manage social media accounts for legitimate businesses -- getting us a single client in a day has the potential to earn you $750/day+, depending on your marketing skills. Our website is socialgrowthexperts.com. Hope to hear from you soon.
title: Experienced marketer needed for client outreach

desc: Are you the sales god we are looking for?My company is currently seeking a few extra social media conoisseurs for our sales department.This job’s salary is commision based and it’s the perfect fit for digital nomads. Work any time from anywhere and get a handful of hundreds USD per month by selling our digital products across the globe.We are an international digital boutique agency providing online solutions to small and medium local businesses around the world who need extra hands by having handled their social media accounts, digital marketing strategies and websites.Looking to expand our team within the digital nomad area by working direclty with like-minded people.About the job:The sales team shall be able to sell our range of services that go from our online stores/websites and digital marketing services such as consulting in SEO and Facebook Ads to Social Media Management as well as any of our combined packages.You will have flexibility and will be location independent. Reliable wifi and an advanced English level is a must for this job.Your comission will be due when you manage to sell one of our services to a client who gets a subscription with us and pays for the service. With this job you’re free to use any tool in order to create inbound leads but free training is included with us.Advantages:-	Easy to sell products for real time benefits.-	Up to 20% profits for each sale made.-	Possibility to expand your own sales team and grow with us.-	Digital nomad lifestyle.Looking for someone who has:-	Strong background in sales.-	Experience with e-mail marketing, lead generation and cold-calling.-	Basic knowledge on marketing.-	Great communication skills.If this description matches what you’re looking for shoot me an e-mail [Removed by [url removed, login to view] Admin] and let’s have a chat!Cheers.

desc: The Accounting Assistant is directly responsible for providing a variety of general accounting tasks and clerical support to the accounting department. This position is responsible for professional, effective communication with management along with other essential professional partners. This candidate will provide a high level of judgment, integrity, and professionalism as a member of the Accounting team.RESPONSIBILITIES:•	Perform the day to day processing of accounts payable transactions•	Receive and verify invoices and requisitions for goods and services•	Verify that transactions comply with financial policies and procedures•	Data entry of all invoices for payment•	Manage the weekly check run•	Record all checks•	Prepare manual checks as and when required•	Maintain a filing system for all financial documents•	Ensure the confidentiality and security of all financial files•	Perform other diverse duties as requested or requiredREQUIREMENTS:•	Proof of USA employment eligibility•	Demonstrated excellent verbal and written communication skills•	Capable of using good judgment and discretion when exposed to confidentialinformation•	Proficient in Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)•	Great Plains experience a plus•	Bachelor degree preferred

desc: Sales Agent – LondonThe RoleThis buzzing marketing company supported by the clout of a market leader is looking for an ambitious Sales Agent to join their successful team. The sales agent will be contacting key decision makers in SME businesses and showing how the company’s offering can revolutionise their current advertising and save them money.This exciting position is commission only, and for a driven Sales Agent there is a potential to take home a generous salary. For a self-motivated and financially driven individual, this is a perfect next step in your sales career to join the ever-changing and updating marketing sector in a company that really supports their employees.Key Responsibilities:· Searching and contacting local businesses· Offering new business a free review of their current advertising· Presenting suggested advertising campaigns to potential clients· Signing clients on board and smashing sales targetsThe CompanyThis fast-paced, growing company is a marketing service provider that offers clients clearer and cheaper advertisement services through a variety of channels including email, social media, magazine adverts and billboards.Take this exciting opportunity to join a nurturing business and make your name in the exciting field of marketing and social media as a key part of a small company’s growth.Benefits· Fantastic monthly passive income opportunity can be built up· A chance to be involved with the progressive and growing marketing sector· Part of an established firm that offers excellent support and trainingThe PersonThe key skills and qualities of a Sales Agent:· Excellent communication skills and a clear telephone manner· Fantastic spoken English· Proven track record of successful sales· Comfortable and confident in a commission based roleIf you are keen on joining this exciting, forward thinking company and taking the next step in your career, then please click the apply now button to find out more.
title: Cold calling Sale Agent Commission only (plus constant monthly earnings as long as the customer stays with us)
